thread.title: Ugwuanyi appoints Senior Advocate as ENSIEC Chairman
thread.title_full: Ugwuanyi appoints Senior Advocate as ENSIEC Chairman

author: Nwafor Polycarp
title: Ugwuanyi appoints Senior Advocate as ENSIEC Chairman
text:
Home » News » Ugwuanyi appoints Senior Advocate as ENSIEC Chairman Ugwuanyi appoints Senior Advocate as ENSIEC Chairman On 
Governor Ifeanyi Ugwuanyi of Enugu State yesterday approved the appointment of a Senior Advocate of Nigeria (SAN), Dr. Michael Ezeugwu Ajogwu as Chairman of the Enugu State Independent Electoral Commission (ENSIEC). Gov. Ifeanyi Ugwuanyi of Enugu State 
Other members of the Commission, according to a statement by the Secretary to the State Government, Dr. Gabriel Ajah include: 
Hon. David Okeke Ngene – Member 
Engr. Mrs MaryRose Obiageli Abba – Member 
Nwabueze Charles Ogbodo – Member 
Dr Green E. Anike-Nweze – Member 
Mr Nnamah, Tagbo Ozoemenam – Secretary. 
The names of the Appointees have been forwarded to Enugu State House of Assembly for confirmation, accordingly. 
Enugu State is in the hands of God! Nwafor Polycarp
